author: Hanif Mianjee
description: Quickly copy JIRA ticket details or a ready-to-use git commit message from any JIRA Cloud ticket page. Includes a status dropdown, feedback UI, and JIRA-matching styling.
name: jira-ticket-copier

scripts.build: vite build && node copy-icons.mjs && node copy-options.mjs && node copy-background.mjs && node copy-welcome.mjs
scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r jira-ticket-copier.zip manifest.json dist/ README.md packaging_instructions.txt
